name: 陳雅玫
objective: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through selected materials at the elementary level, and (2) to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.
schedule:
WEEK 1:  Course introduction
WEEK 2:  Mid-Autumn Festival Holidays
WEEK 3:  Unit 1: Lesson A
WEEK 4:  Unit1: Lesson B
WEEK 5 : 1. Quiz : Unit 1; 2. Unit 2: Lesson A
WEEK 6:  Unit 2: Lesson B
WEEK 7: 	1. Quiz : Unit 2 ; 2. Unit 3: Lesson A
WEEK 8:  Unit 3: Lesson B
WEEK 9:  MID-TERM EXAM
WEEK 10: Unit 4: Lesson A
WEEK 11: Unit 4: Lesson B
WEEK 12: 1. Quiz : Unit 4 ; Unit 5: Lesson A
WEEK 13: Unit 5: Lesson B
WEEK 14: 1. Quiz : Unit 5; 2. Unit 6: Lesson A
WEEK 15: Unit 6: Lesson B
WEEK 16: New Year Holidays
WEEK 17: FINAL EXAM
WEEK 18: ENGLISH PROFICENCY TEST
scorePolicy:
1. 正規課程 + 輔導課程: 70% （其中正規課程占70％，輔導課占30％）
**正規課程中又包括：出席與課堂討論20％＋小考15％＋期中考30％＋
期末考35％）
2. 會考成績: 30%
materials:
1. World Link 2 (Thomson Longman Publishing)
2. Supplemental materials
